text: Debby Barrett is a former Republican member of the Montana Legislature. She was elected for Senate District 36, representing the Dillon, Montana area, in 2008. She previously served 4 terms in the House of Representatives. Barrett served as President of the Senate during the 2015-2016 session. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Montana Republicans Category:Montana state senators Category:Members of the Montana House of Representatives Category:Presidents of the Montana Senate Category:Women state legislators in Montana Category:21st-century American politicians Category:21st-century American women politicians
title: Debby Barrett
